channel.title: AMS:MT on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AMS:MT on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ArcelorMittal Sees Risks to Brazil Expansion on Imports, Tariffs
item.description: ArcelorMittal SA’s expansion plans in Brazil may be limited due to a surge in cheap steel imports and the effects of US tariffs, said the company’s head of Brazilian operations, Jorge Oliveira.
